name: I found the legendary weapon that made me a hero and i'm going to fight the demon lord in a dungeon with my team but...
name_original: I found the legendary weapon that made me a hero and i'm going to fight the demon lord in a dungeon with my team but...
description:
I found the legendary weapon that made me a hero and i'm going to fight the demon lord in a dungeon with my team but my healer has a pretty instable internet connection, or more simply, iftlwtmmahaigtftdliadwmtbmhhapiic is a game about a MMORPG player having an instable internet connection

WARNING : the game is based on having lots of strange keyboard inputs simultaneously, that can behave oddly depending on keyboards you're using. Some keyboard won't allow some keys to be detected pressed as the same time. I don't have any solution for that right now, sorry for incovenience

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 49

Controls

SPACE : Hold to write spells / Release to cast

F1/F2/F3 : select a target to heal

Every letter on the keyboard : write spells

Spells

didn't have the time to detail spells effects so here they are :

  • [SUPPORT] - Heals the target
  • [HEAL] - Quicker to write, but less effective than SUPPORT
  • [FOUNTAIN] - Heals a bit every player
  • [RESURRECT] - Bring back a friend to life. No effect on alive target
  • [QPAWXCMLKERTSD] - You may not have the time to cast this one
